Package io.micronaut.core.propagation

package io.micronaut.core.propagation
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    MutablePropagatedContext
    Mutable propagated context will modify the internal context Intended for use-cases when the propagated context needs to be mutated and propagated later.
    PropagatedContext
    A mechanism for propagating state across threads that's easier to use and safer than ThreadLocal.
    PropagatedContext.Scope
    Closing this object undoes the effect of calling PropagatedContext.propagate() on a context.
    PropagatedContextElement
    Marker interface for an object that can be placed into a PropagatedContext.
    ThreadPropagatedContextElement<S>
    A PropagatedContextElement that bridges to code that uses thread local storage instead of PropagatedContext.
